revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pokemon Mansion |image = [[File:Pokemon Mansion.png|350px]] |caption = An overhead map of the Pokemon Mansion. |tokens = 1,500 |location = West of Cinnabar Island. }} The '''Pokemon Mansion''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 17,760 |- | Magmar (Boss) || 88,800 |}
==Pokémon==
* Growlithe * Vulpix * Grimer * Muk * Koffing * Weezing * Magmar (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 40% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 40% |- | {{Bag3|Token Collector}} [[Token Collector]] || 20% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
